text: Jack Viertel (born February 7, 1949) is an American theatrical producer and writer. He was born in Stamford, Connecticut. From 2000 to 2020, he was a producer at the Encores! series. == Works == * The Secret Life of the American Musical, Farrar, Straus and Giroux, 2016. title: Jack Viertel
